name: FightNJokes
description:
A phantom menace coming from the deepest part of the galaxy has reached the planet of the Jokes.
The evil Dark Father has been transforming thousands of planets into garbage dumps, and now it's time to own and control the planet Joke.
A tournament will unite together the best fighters of the planet, and the best of them will have to face the evil lord and try to beat him in a final battle.

Choose one of the 10 characters, fight your opponents, master your moves and beat the evil lord of the garbage dumps.
Each character has his own story and his own interest in the tournament and your mission is to discover and continue the story by unlocking secret characters.

The game is emulating the retro - resolution 320x200 for old MS-DOS games from the 90's.

Gameplay - Details and Achievements:

* Every time you reach the end of the tournament, you will challenge the evil Dark Father, and then your arch-enemy to complete the game and the character Storyline in a funny and weird way.
* Every character has a special 'Final' move such as Fatality, named Dementiality. They would do something stupid to their opponent and unlock an achievement everytime a combination is found. There is a small indicator appearing at the bottom showing up the correct move you've made, so the player could memorize or retry the combination later on, if still was not found.
* There are also 4 hidden characters which can be unlocked by beating them. Those can be found if you're playing very well (you might be challenged by one of them or the arch-enemy of your current character. You get challenged if you beat the first 3 opponents with at least 3 super moves or perfect scores. ), or if you cross the path of one of those secret characters.
* Those 4 characters have their own story line and their own Dementiality codes too!

To summarize, there are 32 achievements to unlock:
- 14 Endings
- 14 Dementialities
- 4 Secret Characters
